attributes.action: Remove British Occupation from Northern Ireland and allow the Nation to be United
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In Wake of the reports and common knowledge of State Sanctioned murder in Northern Ireland, illegal occupation of Ireland and collusion of British forces with terrorists in murdering people in Northern Ireland, we hereby petition you to remove yourself from Ireland and allow a United Ireland to take place as underpinned in the declaration of 1916 provisional government of Ireland.

Keep Ireland for the Irish, turn the British monarchy and government back to sea!
